text: Jonás Gómez Gallo (12 July 1923 – 24 June 2019) was a Chilean businessman and politician. He was a member of the Radical Party (1948–1971) and the Radical Left Party (1971–1973). He served as a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1957 to 1961, and as a Senator from 1961 to 1969. Gómez Gallo was born in Antofagasta. He died on 24 June 2019 in Santiago, Chile, at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Chilean businesspeople Category:Chilean politicians
title: Jonás Gómez Gallo
